version_description:
-Fixed cloud sync issues*
*note - to fix current cloud bugs: Get this version, log into Game Center, Log into Facebook.

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

-Egg Hatchery - Your eggs automatically hatch after a while when you get free hammers!
-New level sections
-Savebug fixed
